name: Creative2
description:
Creative2 was founded in 2009 with the goal of offering innovative technology and communication services while also creating a family oriented culture that is sustainable and allows team members flexibility for personal lives and pursuits.
As a service provider, Creative2's goals are twofold:
To develop systems that help organizations improve internal productivity and efficiency, ultimately positively affecting their bottom lines.
To work with clients to craft creative communication solutions that break through the noise - reaching customers and stakeholders in more compelling, effective ways.
At the community level, Creative2 seeks to partner with nonprofits, churches and other organizations around Virginia to support and provide education services that encourage and equip individuals with work skills that are relevant in our ever-changing, globalized economy.
